title: FPS LOW
body: Since i updated my mac to Sierra 10.12.4, my FPS has dropped in game from about 100 to about 20, and i can't even play with a full screen on my moniter

replies.body: I'm having the same problem especially after I updated my mac to Sierra 10.12.4 and mine too falls minimum to 20 fps. I have mentioned this in the forum and I got the same reply to check out the FPS guide. I did everything in that guide still the fps issue remains. I think something happened after the update because before that everything was running smoothly.

This may be caused by certain settings on your Mac that were reset to defaults after that update. Sometimes the Automatic Graphics Switch can cause League to have FPS problems, so let's check for that. Also be sure to hit the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) as well!
